name: Undead Spirit
HP: 30 (Ghostly and Putrid only) or 20 (Skeletal only) + 10 time the power level

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The Fey makes a number of attacks equal to half the power level (rounded down).

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: your spell attack modifier to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 3 + spell power piercing damage + 1d6 force damage.

actions.name: Deathly Touch (Ghostly Only)
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: your spell attack modifier to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 1d8 + 3 + the spell power necrotic damage, and the creature must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw against your spell save DC or be frightened of the undead until the end of the target's next turn.

actions.name: Grave Bolt (Skeletal Only)
actions.description: Ranged Spell Attack: your spell attack modifier to hit, range 150 ft., one target. Hit: 2d4 + 3 + the spell’s level necrotic damage.

actions.name: Putrid Claw (Putrid Only)
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: your spell attack modifier to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 3 + the spell’s level slashing damage. If the target is poisoned, it must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against your spell save DC or be paralyzed until the end of its next turn.
